casebody.data:
Barrett C. BAXLEY
v.
Jasmine BAXLEY No. 16P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Mr. Ryan McKaig, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Baxley, Barrett C. Mr. Jody Stuart Foyles, Southern Pines, Attorney at Law, for Baxley, Jasmine *588ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of January 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
